member.name: M:System.IDirectoryNameExtensions.CurrentDirectory(R5T.T0021.IDirectoryName)
member.summary: Returns '.', which at the command line stands for the current directory.

member.name: M:System.IDirectoryNameExtensions.ParentDirectory(R5T.T0021.IDirectoryName)
member.summary: Returns '..', which at the command line stands for the parent directory of the current directory.

member.name: T:R5T.T0021.X003.Documentation
member.summary: Common, public, path-related data value extensions.
